content: If a resource no longer uses a value set (e.g. http://build.fhir.org/valueset-care-plan-relationship.html), is it ok to just delete it from the resource spreadsheet? Any reason to preserve it?
Should be ok. I don't think we publish any value sets that aren't referenced from somewhere
@Lloyd McKenzie , I assume that is a non-substantive change that doesn't require FMG approval, right? I wouldn't think any code should be impacted by me removing an unused value set.
If the build runs locally with the removal, you're fine.
What about changes terminology.xml. Assuming that would require a patch?
